snippet.title: Spirits of the Hellements - TD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Assemble legendary Spirits and defend against the endless hordes of Hell. A tower defense where you must shape the battlefield and create a maze using the three Hellements. Use Fire, Lightning, and Wind tiles to trap your enemies, or augment your defenses.

Spirits of the Hellements - TD Gameplay Trailer
Game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1742610
Check Out My Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/dead202/
Follow Me On Twitter: https://twitter.com/_dead202_Gamer
